Column3:
1. Server
- Node.js 20 LTS và npm
- Backend API: http://localhost:4000
- Frontend UI: http://localhost:5173
- Admin Dashboard: http://localhost:5174
- Commands: npm run dev (all services) ho?c npm run server --prefix backend

2. Database
- MongoDB Atlas ho?c local MongoDB
- Configuration: MONGO_URL trong backend/.env
- Required credentials: VNPAY, Stripe, MoMo trong .env

3. Web Browser
- Chrome/Firefox/Edge (latest version)
- JavaScript enabled
- LocalStorage enabled

4. Test Data
- Test users v?i các roles: user, admin, staff
- Sample food items và categories
- Test payment accounts cho VNPAY/Stripe/MoMo sandbox
